text: Any company, broker, or agent guilty of violating any of the provisions of this chapter or any order, rule, or regulation issued pursuant to this chapter shall be subject to the provisions of §§ 31-2502.03 and 31-2502.36, respectively.

chapter.text: Regulation of Casualty and Other Insurance Rates.
